General.Name: Agro Yasa Lestari PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Agro Yasa Lestari Tbk designs, supplies, and installs geosynthetics in Indonesia. The company trades in asphalt, geosynthetic, and soybean beans meal. In addition, it offers gabions, asphalt bitumen, geogrid, ESSO, geobags, and geotextile fabrics. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Agro Yasa Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Anugerah Cakrawala Dunia.
General.Address: Gondangdia Lama Building 25, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10330
